        Gets the application-wide actions.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        start - The start index for pagination (0 based).
        end - The end index for pagination (0 based).
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

        Gets the actions of a single user.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        userId - The user for whom the actions will be returned.

        end - The end index for pagination (0 based).
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

        context - The current context.
        userId - The user for whom the actions will be returned.
        entityKey - The entity key.
        start - The start index for pagination (0 based).

        listener - A listener to handle the result.
